course.subject: MATH
course.name: Computer Age Statistical Inference
course.description: This course is open to post graduates in applied mathematics, statistics, and engineering who are interested in learning from data. It covers advanced topics in statistical learning and inference, featured with various applications in computer vision, human genetics, and text mining. It emphasizes the integration of statistical modeling and algorithm design for statistical inference. Examples includes variational inference with its applications in deep learning. Students should seek approval from the instructor to take this course.
